system.requirements:
Tier 1; Willpower 40, is an Ogryn
Aptitudes: Willpower, General
system.effect:
Character no longer suffers a penalty to act in Confined Spaces as a result of "But it Dark in Dere!" Trait. 
Additionally, they can make a -20 Willpower Test to enter a confined space of their own accord if their duties demand it. If they fail they must still be ordered to enter the space as normal.
